description:
Title: Finance Assistant

Duration: 06+ Months (With Possible extension)

Location: Culver City, CA 90232 (Remote)


Job Description


This position is supporting Client’s new original video subscription service, Client TV+, featuring original shows, movies and documentaries from the world’s most creative storytellers


Description

  • Provide broad invoicing support to the financial management of the budgeting, reporting, forecasting, purchase orders and daily invoices across global Publicity, Studio Communications, Talent Relations, Awards and Events.
  • Manage timely billing, invoices, reporting and analyze actuals vs budgets cost reports to ensure accuracy and quickly resolve any issues.
  • Specialize setup of vendors and other external partners in collaboration with Procurement
  • Determine ideal line of spend across multiple options and
  • Other duties as assigned.

Qualifications

  • 2 years + experience in purchase order development, execution, and tracking, from invoice through payment
  • Proven track record of tracking and processing invoices, comparing commitments versus actuals, and general budgeting
  • Ability to determine resources, track costs and establish partnerships with across Client TV+, Client Original Films and Client Studios
  • Proactive thinker who can prioritize and manage multiple projects and meet deadlines
  • Detail-oriented with strong organizational, collaboration, problem-solving and communication skills


Education

  • Bachelor's degree is required.
